- **Hours and Payment Methods**: The business operates from 8am to 5pm, Monday through Friday, and is closed on Saturdays and Sundays[1]. There is no specific information on payment methods for this particular business, but it is common for such businesses to accept various payment methods.

aboutUs: At M.C. Remodeling Construction LLC, we are a team of highly skilled tradesmen, designers, and specialists dedicated to delivering exceptional plumbing and construction services to the Birmingham area. Our expertise spans a wide range of specialties, including floor installation, drywall installation, painting, concrete work, kitchen remodeling, and general construction. With a deep understanding of our craft and a commitment to quality, we strive to provide our local community with unparalleled service and craftsmanship.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the difference of working with a team of true professionals who prioritize quality, expertise, and customer satisfaction above all else.
sellingPoints: Highly skilled and certified tradesmen with a passion for their craft and a commitment to continuous professional development.
Specialized expertise in a wide range of construction and plumbing services, ensuring we can handle any project with precision and excellence.
Dedicated to serving the Birmingham community with personalized attention, superior workmanship, and a focus on delivering exceptional results.
